title: Alaska Public Lands: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Downtown Anchorage Summer hours run from Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day.  In summer, the operating hours are 9 AM to 5 PM, seven days a week.   Winter hours run from after Labor Day weekend to Memorial Day. In winter, the operating hours are 10 AM to 5 PM, Tuesday-Friday. Closed on all federal holidays.  Call (907) 644-3661 or toll free 1-866-869-6887 for more information. You can also visit: http://www.alaskacenters.gov/anchorage-hours.cfm  Fairbanks Call (907) 459-3730 for more information or visit our website at: http://www.alaskacenters.gov/fairbanks-hours.cfm  Southeast Alaska Discovery Center Call (907) 228-6220 for more information or visit: http://www.alaskacenters.gov/ketchikan-hours.cfm  Tok Center Call (907) 883-5667 for more information or visit: http://www.alaskacenters.gov/tok-hours.cfm
